Module ‘’island’‘¶

This code will contain the island class

class biosim.island.Island(le_map=None, fsav_max=None, fjung_max=None, alpha=None)[source]¶

Class to contain information about food and map

Sets the variables in the Island-class

Input: :param le_map is the string input of the map :param fsav_max is the maximum amount of food on the savannah tiles :param fjung_max is the maximum amount of food on the jungle tiles :param alpha: The growing factor for the food

add_animals(animal_list)[source]¶
Adds herbivore to the map
param animal_list:
 A list that contains the animals wegiht, age and species and where we want to add them
fetch_naturetype(pos)[source]¶

Fetches the naturetype of the map in the input position :param pos: The given tile :return: which naturetype the given tile has

food_gets_eaten(pos, f_animal)[source]¶

reduces the amount of food avaliable on the tiles

:param f_animal:how much food the herbivore wants to eat :param pos: THe position of the map :return: gives out the amount of food eaten

grow_food(pos)[source]¶

Updates the amount of food after the animals have eaten in a given position :param pos: The position of the map

limit_map_vals()[source]¶

Raises ValueErrors if the input island-string violates any of the criterions for the island

num_animals()[source]¶

Goes through each animal list counting the number of ecch species :return: the total numer of each species

set_food(pos)[source]¶

Sets the initial food-values for a tile of a given position :param pos: The position of the map

set_new_params(terrain, new_params)[source]¶

Sets new parameters Parameters ———- :param terrain: Which of the naturetype you want to set new parameters for :param new_params : dict

Legal keys: ‘fsav_max’, ‘alpha’, ‘fjung_max’

ValueError, KeyError

string_to_matrix()[source]¶

Converts the input multiline-string to a matrix
